name: Bone Warper
description:
This is a wild, weird platformer about bones. It was made for LowRezJam2018.

It gets challenging- in a puzzley way, not an actiony one. You should be able to figure it out if you keep at it...

A gamepad is very recommended!!

Hint: Going to the map screen (pressing "Select" or "Tab") will reset the area you are in. This can either be helpful or annoying.
